docs.snippet: On Saturday night, between 6 and 7 o'clock, the extensive lumber concern known as the "Metropolitan Steam Planing and Saw Mills," situated on the junction of West Thirteenth-street with the Ninth and Tenth-avenues, was discovered to be on fire.
docs.lead_paragraph: On Saturday night, between 6 and 7 o'clock, the extensive lumber concern known as the "Metropolitan Steam Planing and Saw Mills," situated on the junction of West Thirteenth-street with the Ninth and Tenth-avenues, was discovered to be on fire.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; EXTENSIVE CONFLAORATION AND LOSS OF LIFE. THE FIRE ON BOARD OF THE SHIP ROBERT CENTER. THE NINETEENTH WARD WHIGS. A BLOCKADE. SAILING OF THE PACIFIC. LAUNCH. IMPROVED RAILROAD CARS. HIGH RENTS. THE PRUSSIAN NOTE COUNTERFEITERS. MORE RECKLESS RUFFIANISM. ROBBERT, AND JUDICIAL DIECISION OF A POLICEMAN. ACCIDENT. STREET ACCIDENT. SUPREME COURT.

docs.snippet: The attendance upon the Democratic State Convention is unusually large. The whole area of the Syracuse House, below, is crowded, and the sidewalk is also thronged, so great is the number of outsiders. Governor MARCY, HORATIO SEYMOUR, Controller...
docs.lead_paragraph: The attendance upon the Democratic State Convention is unusually large. The whole area of the Syracuse House, below, is crowded, and the sidewalk is also thronged, so great is the number of outsiders. Governor MARCY, HORATIO SEYMOUR, Controller WRIGHT, CHATFIELD, MATHER and others, are here among the outsiders.

headline.main: LATEST INTELLIGENCE; By Telegraph to the New-York Daily Times. The Democratic State Convention. Mossachusetts Whig State Convention. Whig Congressional Convention. A Whig Procession--Mass Meeting New-Hampshire Whig State Convention. Missouri Legislature. Whig Gathering in Washington. Executive Appointment Confirmed. Excitement in the Breadstuff Market. From the South--Great Floods from the late Storm-Duel Prevented. Destructive Fires in Louisiana--Alexandria nearly Destroyed. Large Fire at Ogdensburg. Accidental Death. Another Mail Failure.-The Freshet. Departure of the Canada. Accident, &c.

docs.snippet: CHAPTER OF ACCIDENTS.--A young man by the name of MERRILL, belonging to Waterford, Me., met with a serious accident a few days ago. He was at work attending a threshing machine, the horses attached to which had become frightened, and in endeavoring...
docs.lead_paragraph: CHAPTER OF ACCIDENTS.--A young man by the name of MERRILL, belonging to Waterford, Me., met with a serious accident a few days ago. He was at work attending a threshing machine, the horses attached to which had become frightened, and in endeavoring to stop the machine, his foot was caught in the beater, and the leg, just above the ancle, shattered and torn all to pieces.

docs.snippet: The Annual Address before the New-York State Agricultural Society was delivered at Utica, on Thursday last, by Hon. HORATRO SRYMOUR. We give the speech verbatim. Mr. SEYMOUR said: Seventy years since, GEORGE WASHINGTON passed this place on his way to...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Annual Address before the New-York State Agricultural Society was delivered at Utica, on Thursday last, by Hon. HORATRO SRYMOUR. We give the speech verbatim. Mr. SEYMOUR said: Seventy years since, GEORGE WASHINGTON passed this place on his way to Fort Stanwix, (now the village of Rome) to visit that remote outpost of civilization.
docs.abstract: Address before the NY. Agricultural fair

headline.main: AGRICULTURE:; ITS PAST AND PRESENT ERAS. AN ADDRESS Delivered before the New-York State Agricultural Society: [Reported for the New-York Daily Times.]

docs.snippet: The second day of the festival has passed with its dust and bustle, and excitement. I said in my last, that the city was overflowing. To-day we have the strongest proofs of the fact. The over-plus of yesterday filled the comfortable retreats in the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The second day of the festival has passed with its dust and bustle, and excitement. I said in my last, that the city was overflowing. To-day we have the strongest proofs of the fact. The over-plus of yesterday filled the comfortable retreats in the suburbs. The thousands who arrived to-day, consequently have been obliged to pack in town; and you may be sure we have a jam of it.

headline.main: NEW-YORK.; STATE AGRICULTURAL FAIR. SECOND DAY. The Second Day of the Fair--The Multitude Arrival of Gov. Hunt and others--Scenes in the Streets--General Scott--Number of Visitors--Comparative Merits of the Display--Floral Hall and its Contents. &c.

docs.snippet: The public know that if a message is given to a telegraphic operator, it can be delivered in a few moments to a distant friend; but of the modus operandi; they have been obliged to remain in comparative ignorance.
docs.lead_paragraph: The public know that if a message is given to a telegraphic operator, it can be delivered in a few moments to a distant friend; but of the modus operandi; they have been obliged to remain in comparative ignorance.

docs.snippet: BOARD OF ALDERMEN.--The fifth session of the Board of Aldermen was held last evening. The Broadway Railroad.--Petitions were presented from 4,300 persons in favor of a Railroad through Broadway. Another Alarm Bell.--The firemen of the XIIth Ward...
docs.lead_paragraph: BOARD OF ALDERMEN.--The fifth session of the Board of Aldermen was held last evening. The Broadway Railroad.--Petitions were presented from 4,300 persons in favor of a Railroad through Broadway. Another Alarm Bell.--The firemen of the XIIth Ward petitioned for an alarm bell, to be located on the corner of Fourth-avenue and One-hundred-and-ninth street.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; BOARD OF ALDERMEN. BOARD OF SUPERVISORS. UNIVERSALIST CONVENTION. A MAD BULL IN THE PARK. DESTRUCTION OF AN OIL FACTORY BY FIRE. RIOT. ARREST UPON SUSPICION OF MURDER. THE SESSIONS. A MAN KILLED AND WITNESSES WANTED. QUICK TIME. CITY MORTALITY. LIBERAL. DEMOCRATIC COUNTY CONVENTION. PRESENTATION TO THE MAYOR'S CLERK. A MAN STABRED. ANOTHER MUSICAL CELEBRITY. INIQUITOUS. PERUVIAN MINISTER FIRE. Good SUGGESTIONS. NEW ROUTE. BOARD OF ASSISTANTS ROBBING FLOUR MERCHANTS. COMMON PLEAS DROWNED. COURT CALENDAR. COMMON PLEAS.

docs.snippet: Her Majesty Queen VICTORIA commenced her journey northward on Monday last, and by this time is safely housed at Balmoral, the royal retreat in the Scottish Highlands, where she is enabled to reside in more privacy than in any other part of her...
docs.lead_paragraph: Her Majesty Queen VICTORIA commenced her journey northward on Monday last, and by this time is safely housed at Balmoral, the royal retreat in the Scottish Highlands, where she is enabled to reside in more privacy than in any other part of her dominions.

headline.main: GREAT BRITAIN.; The Queen's Progress--The Times and Moniteur--Miscellaneous.
